attributes.name: maxLoad
attributes.description: Maximum load transmitted from the tensioner

attributes.name: minLoad
attributes.description: Minimum load transmitted from the tensioner

attributes.name: pipelineDisplacement
attributes.description: Pipeline displacement through the tensioner for a load variation of: max load - min load

attributes.name: direction
attributes.description: Direction of the applied load referreing to local X-axis of the element going through the tensioner (+1 = The load will act in local X-axis. -1 = The load will act opposite local X-axis).
